programme.title: USA, Cuba, and Guantanamo Bay
programme.short_synopsis: The housing of Cuban refugees at the American military base at Guantanamo bay.
programme.medium_synopsis: The US role in the Cuban War of Independence and how America is housing Cuban refugees in the Guantanamo Bay facility are considered by Alistair Cooke.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
